name: Crypt's Crawlers
description:
Unfortunately I introduced a bug while adding sounds that messed up the turn timings. If you kill an enemy with no AP left, at best, the game let's you initiate another battle but, then the enemy doesn't ever take a turn. Don't know / can't fix it, so don't do that,

This is a dungeon crawler that takes a concept from Heartbeast's tutorial series on a mobile game. I was bored and decided to follow along. After that, I got a lot of ideas to keep developing it and this game came out of it.

With shops, traps, treasure, boss battles you'll have a pretty well rounded experience. It's not the best next dungeon crawler but, I think I did an ok job for a simple approach.
